Node.definition: literally: days; hence: = an unspecified amount of time
= man, probably to be identified with Xerxes; ◄ son of Darius (דָּרְיָוֶשׁ) I; ► king of Persia (פָּרַס) husband of Vashti (וַשְׁתִּי) and Esther (אֶסְתֵּר)
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= man, probably to be identified with Xerxes; ◄ son of Darius (דָּרְיָוֶשׁ) I; ► king of Persia (פָּרַס) husband of Vashti (וַשְׁתִּי) and Esther (אֶסְתֵּר)

Node.gloss: to reign|to be king|to be queen|to become king|to become queen
Node.definition: = state in which humans or deities are in a position of royal authority over a group of people
= land; ◄ located east of Persia (פָּרַס) ► eastern boundary of kingdom of king Ahasuerus (אֲחַשְׁוֵרֹושׁ) Xerxes
particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y
= ethnic group and their territory, ◄ regarded as descendants of Cush, son of Ham (חָם)
= state in which a countable entity is seven in number
= state in which a countable entity is one hundred in number
= an adminstrative division of a country or a city
literally: days; hence: = an unspecified amount of time
literally: to sit on a throne; hence: = action by which humans or deities assume a position of leadership, ◄ symbolized by taking position on the seat that represents this position of authority
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= man, probably to be identified with Xerxes; ◄ son of Darius (דָּרְיָוֶשׁ) I; ► king of Persia (פָּרַס) husband of Vashti (וַשְׁתִּי) and Esther (אֶסְתֵּר)
the throne representing someone's position as monarch or judge
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= town; ► capital of Persia (פָּרַס)
= a fortress that commands a city and is used in the control of the inhabitants and in defense during attack or siege.
= state in which a countable entity is three in number

Node.gloss: to reign|to be king|to be queen|to become king|to become queen

Node.gloss: to cause to happen|to bring about
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities cause events to take place without them having to necessarily be involved in the event itself
literally: drinking; hence: = a banquet meal or feast with honored guests
= someone in a position of authority in an army, at a royal court, of a town, within a family, among priests, or elsewhere

= man who is under the authority of someone else as that person's legal property, employee, subject, or vassal; or someone who presents himself as such when speaking to someone of importance or praying to God

= an organized military force equipped for fighting on land; this term denotes primarily the foot soldiers, though it can also be used to refer to the entire fighting force, including chariots and horsemen
= a nation and its territory, which was greatly expanded during the reign of Cyrus (כֹּורֶשׁ) I.
= a nation and their territory; ◄ regarded as founded by Madai; the empire was consolidated in the 6th 5th and stretched from Mesopotamia to Turkey
= people belonging to the nobility ≈ and considered worthy of respect
= someone in a position of authority in an army, at a royal court, of a town, within a family, among priests, or elsewhere
= an adminstrative division of a country or a city
= causative action by which humans or deities cause humans to perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= state in which humans possess an abundance of valuable goods, ≈ which is usually associated with a high status and considered a blessing from God
= state in which an event is of an extraordinary nature

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= state in which humans or objects are considered valuable and worthy of appreciation and respect
= state in which a human being or deity has an elevated status, as a result of their authority, rank, wealth, or wisdom

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= state in which objects or events are numerous in quantity or frequency
= state in which a countable entity is eighty in number
= state in which a countable entity is one hundred in number

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= process by which a certain amount of time fully elapses

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= marker identifying a set of multiple objects with a set that already exists in the mind of the hearers

= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
literally: to be found (in a place); hence: = state in which humans or objects are located in a certain place
= town; ► capital of Persia (פָּרַס)
= a fortress that commands a city and is used in the control of the inhabitants and in defense during attack or siege.
= state in which a human being or deity has an elevated status, as a result of their authority, rank, wealth, or wisdom
particle linking two objects, of which the first is not always listed explicitly; = relation indicating that object X and object Y are at opposite ends of a range of similar objects
= state in which humans are of relatively low esteem
literally: drinking; hence: = a banquet meal or feast with honored guests
= state in which a countable entity is seven in number

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= area enclosed by walls or buildings
= a fenced portion of land, ► used for growing flowers, plants, and vegetables, but also as burial place; ≈ associated with beauty and fragrance
= residence of the royal family
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= white cloth; ◄ woven out of either linen or cotton; ► used for making clothes or to decorate the house; ≈ regarded as valuable and therefore symbolizing high status

= an annual plant, which grows to 2 meters in height, with soft, lobed leaves and mallow like flowers, which are yellow with a purple center; when the flower matures, the boll underneath puffs out and eventually splits, revealing a mass of fine white filaments that we know as “cotton wool;” ◄ Gossypium herbaceum; ► used for making cloth
= woven material, dyed reddish purple with a substance obtained from the murex shellfish

Node.gloss: to be held|to be caught|to be fastened|to be attached|to be girded
Node.definition: = to be held in position firmly in a certain place

= piece of stout cord; ◄ made by twisting together palm fibres, linen, or reeds; ► used for tying and keeping things together, climbing, measuring, drawing things to oneself, making traps, etc.; ≈ often used in a figurative sense to refer to conditions that try to take control of people; a rope tied around the head is a symbol of submission

= high quality woven material ◄ made from the stems of the flax plant; absorbs perspiration better than many other types of cloth; ► used for production of cloth and clothes; worn by the rich and by priests and Levites; ≈ associated with quality, strength, and coolness
= woven material, dyed reddish purple with a substance obtained from the murex shellfish

meaning unsure, possibly: = a small circular band of precious metal, ► used for hanging curtains|meaning unsure; possibly: = a thin straight metal bar, ► possibly used for several purposes, such as hanging curtains, as a hinge of doors, etc.
= silver, usually in the form of small unstamped pieces that had to be weighed in order to determine their value; after the exile, people in Israel started using coins
= a tall, vertical structure ◄ made of metal, stone, or wood ► and used as support for a building or for decoration
= white calcite alabaster stone; ► used for decoration of buildings; ≈ regarded as valuable and beautiful
= a low platform standing on four legs, a bit longer than the length of a man, and about 70 80 centimeters wide; ► used by people of means to sit or sleep on
= metal of a bright yellow color, ◄ found in rocks and alluvial deposits ► and used as a monetary standard and in jewellery and plating; ≈ associated with wealth, beauty, and prosperity
= silver, usually in the form of small unstamped pieces that had to be weighed in order to determine their value; after the exile, people in Israel started using coins
= a flat area, often made of stone or mosaic, that serves as the floor of an enclosed structure or an open courtyard
exact meaning unsure; probably: = some type of hard stone, ► used in constructions like pavements; ≈ regarded as valuable
= white calcite alabaster stone; ► used for decoration of buildings; ≈ regarded as valuable and beautiful
= hard, smooth, pearly layer ◄ from the inside of certain seashells; ► used for varied purposes; ≈ cherished as precious and as sign of status
= human made object of any kind, usually specified by the context, ◄ of various makings ► and made for various purposes
= metal of a bright yellow color, ◄ found in rocks and alluvial deposits ► and used as a monetary standard and in jewellery and plating; ≈ associated with wealth, beauty, and prosperity
= human made object of any kind, usually specified by the context, ◄ of various makings ► and made for various purposes
= human made object of any kind, usually specified by the context, ◄ of various makings ► and made for various purposes

= dark red alcoholic liquid; ◄ made out of grapes through the process of fermentation; ► used as beverage, though to be avoided by Nazirites, and by priests when on duty; ≈ associated with joy and well being, but also with drunkenness and foolishness; used as metaphor for anger, aggressive behavior, and sex
= state in which objects or events are numerous in quantity or frequency
literally: as the hand of a king; hence: = a state in which something is done without holding back as can be expected from a king
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= a rule or directive made and maintained by someone in authority

Node.gloss: there is not|it is not|it does not
Node.definition: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non existant
= to enforce a certain type of behavior
literally: to lay as foundation; hence: = action by which humans or deities make a firm decision about something
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
literally: great one; hence: = someone in a position of authority at a royal court or on a ship
literally: house; hence: = a group of people associated with a house, such as the family living there, or the descendants of the head of the household

Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action

= female, foreign ruler of a nation or area

= woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= state in which a countable entity is the seventh in a range

Node.gloss: to be in high spirits|to be merry
Node.definition: literally: (one's) heart is good; hence: = state in which humans are in high spirits, ◄ usually under the influence of alcohol
literally: heart; hence: = the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

= dark red alcoholic liquid; ◄ made out of grapes through the process of fermentation; ► used as beverage, though to be avoided by Nazirites, and by priests when on duty; ≈ associated with joy and well being, but also with drunkenness and foolishness; used as metaphor for anger, aggressive behavior, and sex

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= state in which the outward appearance of humans or objects is pleasing to the eye
= state in which events are well performed, morally and ethically correct, and beneficial to others
literally: good to look at; hence: = state in which humans or animals are considered pleasant to look at
= referent to a female person or another object that is considered feminine
= state in which humans and deities are unwilling to assent to a suggestion or proposal
= female, foreign ruler of a nation or area
= woman; ► wife of Ahasuerus (אֲחַשְׁוֵרֹושׁ) king of Persia (פָּרַס) was deposed as queen of Persia and replaced by Esther (אֶסְתֵּר)

= a male who has been castrated and made to serve in the women's quarters in the royal palace
= process by which humans in a position of authority or deities respond with anger to a situation in which (other) humans have disobeyed an order or broken a law
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= state in which humans and deities experience excitement ◄ caused by anger
literally: to burn; hence: = process by which events such as evil and anger happen with intensity and with consequences, as if it were fire

Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= state in which humans, deities or animals have a certain level of wisdom, intelligence, or proficiency

Node.definition: literally: to know; hence: = state in which humans have the experience, skill, and expertise to carry out a particular activity
= a range of important events happening in a certain period of time
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind
= a rule or directive made and maintained by someone in authority

= the act of giving a verdict on a case or person in a dispute and ensure that the verdict is implemented, which, ideally, results in vindication for the innocent and punishment for the guilty; this can only be done by someone in authority, such as a judge or ruler or even God himself

= a nation and their territory; ◄ regarded as founded by Madai; the empire was consolidated in the 6th 5th and stretched from Mesopotamia to Turkey

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= action by which humans assume a sitting position in a certain location and remain in that position for some time; ≈ sometimes associated with a certain status, role, or common activity
= state of authority within a group of people
= a rule or directive made and maintained by someone in authority

= a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified

Node.gloss: to go out|to go forth|to be known
Node.definition: literally: to go out; hence: = process by which certain information is becoming publicly known
= female, foreign ruler of a nation or area
= woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not
= action by which someone causes other people to consider someone or something else unworthy of attention or respect, and shows that by his/her actions
= person exercising authority over people, animals, or inanimate objects in the role of owner, ruler, or husband

= one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used to see things, after which the observed information is stored and processed in the mind; sparkling when the body is healthy and strong, but dim when weak or sick; the eyes also play a significant role in determining whether a person is considered beautiful or not; eyes can reflect both an attitude of compassion and a sentiment of malice; ≈ high eyes are associated with pride, whereas lowly eyes are connected with humility; a good eye is associated with generosity, whereas an evil eye denotes stinginess; winking the eye is associated with underhanded practices

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= man, probably to be identified with Xerxes; ◄ son of Darius (דָּרְיָוֶשׁ) I; ► king of Persia (פָּרַס) husband of Vashti (וַשְׁתִּי) and Esther (אֶסְתֵּר)

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= woman; ► wife of Ahasuerus (אֲחַשְׁוֵרֹושׁ) king of Persia (פָּרַס) was deposed as queen of Persia and replaced by Esther (אֶסְתֵּר)
= female, foreign ruler of a nation or area

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= a woman of rank
= a nation and its territory, which was greatly expanded during the reign of Cyrus (כֹּורֶשׁ) I.
= a nation and their territory; ◄ regarded as founded by Madai; the empire was consolidated in the 6th 5th and stretched from Mesopotamia to Turkey
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= female, foreign ruler of a nation or area
= someone in a position of authority in an army, at a royal court, of a town, within a family, among priests, or elsewhere
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= state of being more abundant than desirable
= state in which someone considers someone or something else unworthy of attention or respect, and shows that by his/her actions
= process by which humans or deities respond with anger to a situation in which (other) humans have disobeyed an order or broken a law
= marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= state in which events are well performed, morally and ethically correct, and beneficial to others

Node.gloss: to go out|to go forth|to be known
Node.definition: literally: to go out; hence: = process by which certain information is becoming publicly known
= action by which humans or deities mark letters, words or other symbols on a surface, such as clay, stone, skin, or papyrus, usually with a pointed stylus or reed
= a rule or directive made and maintained by someone in authority
= a nation and its territory, which was greatly expanded during the reign of Cyrus (כֹּורֶשׁ) I.
= a nation and their territory; ◄ regarded as founded by Madai; the empire was consolidated in the 6th 5th and stretched from Mesopotamia to Turkey
= a linker introducing a propostion that contains the content of what precedes
= woman; ► wife of Ahasuerus (אֲחַשְׁוֵרֹושׁ) king of Persia (פָּרַס) was deposed as queen of Persia and replaced by Esther (אֶסְתֵּר)
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= man, probably to be identified with Xerxes; ◄ son of Darius (דָּרְיָוֶשׁ) I; ► king of Persia (פָּרַס) husband of Vashti (וַשְׁתִּי) and Esther (אֶסְתֵּר)
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= female person with whom someone has some level of association, for example, by geography, social or ethnic grouping, personal connection, or temporary circumstance
= state in which humans and deities have character, integrity, and good fortune
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= causative action by which deities or humans in a position of authority establish a certain condition or pattern of events
= process by which an event happens with great strength or intensity
= referent to a female person or another object that is considered feminine
= woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not
= state in which humans or objects are considered valuable and worthy of appreciation and respect
= person exercising authority over people, animals, or inanimate objects in the role of owner, ruler, or husband
= state in which a human being or deity has an elevated status, as a result of their authority, rank, wealth, or wisdom
particle linking two objects, of which the first is not always listed explicitly; = relation indicating that object X and object Y are at opposite ends of a range of similar objects
= state in which humans are of relatively low esteem
= state in which humans or deities consider a matter or an activity morally and/or ethically right

= one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used to see things, after which the observed information is stored and processed in the mind; sparkling when the body is healthy and strong, but dim when weak or sick; the eyes also play a significant role in determining whether a person is considered beautiful or not; eyes can reflect both an attitude of compassion and a sentiment of malice; ≈ high eyes are associated with pride, whereas lowly eyes are connected with humility; a good eye is associated with generosity, whereas an evil eye denotes stinginess; winking the eye is associated with underhanded practices
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= someone in a position of authority in an army, at a royal court, of a town, within a family, among priests, or elsewhere

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= man; ► adviser to king Ahasuerus (אֲחַשְׁוֵרֹושׁ) (Xerxes) of Persia (פָּרַס)
= causative action by which humans send a message, (supposedly) in the form of a written document to someone else
= written document; made of papyrus or parchment; either as a single sheet or several sheets sewn together and rolled for storage
= an adminstrative division of a country or a city
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= an adminstrative division of a country or a city
= an adminstrative division of a country or a city
= the way a certain language is written
literally: tongue; hence: = a system of communication used by a community, ethnic group, or nation
= state in which humans are in a position of authority over a group of people
literally: house; hence: = a group of people associated with a house, such as the family living there, or the descendants of the head of the household

= action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually not directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
literally: tongue; hence: = a system of communication used by a community, ethnic group, or nation
